entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 3:51PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Rising Water Levels On The Tanana River This Week... The Tanana River between Delta Junction and Fairbanks will be rising to near bankfull levels this week. entry.cap:areaDesc: Deltana and Tanana Flats; Middle Tanana Valley

entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Vermont... Otter Creek At Middlebury affecting Addison County. entry.summary: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT...
